summary:
I am a double master degree student  with a passion for technology and innovation, I thrive on solving complex problems and delivering top-notch solutions. With a strong interest in artificial intelligence, data analysis, software development, and cybersecurity. 

I've worked as a software developer and academic researcher. I have also successfully developed multiple Machine Learning projects. I see myself as a dedicated individual with strong interpersonal, teamwork, and time management skills. 

During my university stage I combined my studies with coaching futsal in a sports academy, where I promoted the value of collaboration, teamwork, discipline, humility, and hard work.

experience.description: Contributed to the development of a multi-animal tracking and behavior detection tool using CV models. Contributed alongside two Ph. D. and 4 graduate students in data processing, performance testing, and visualization.

experience.description: Contributed to the design, development and deployment of a Software tool that permitted the company‚Äôs complete digitalization. Collaborated with client during the design, adapting the user interface to the specific requirements. Resulted in a complete usable platform completely integrated.

experience.description: Contributed to the development of a tool for a cyber situational awareness platform to detect and identify patterns of cyberattacks and provide dynamic risk management. Designed/developed/incorporated NLP model for building risk management rules using natural language reducing a 50% configuration time, eliminating the need for specialists for the task.

Design/Compute a popularity metric for researching the most popular senators, topics, and connections. Illustrated the extensive analysis insights of the senate paradigm, focused on party popularity differences.

projects.description:
Project for IIT's Deep Learning course in Fall Semester 2022. In this project we propose three different deep learning models for predicting a song's popularity using three different sets of features:

- General Song Features
- Musical Analysis Features
- Lyrics Features
projects.title: Design and Development of a song popularity predictor using Keras Neural Networks
